product.title: Peter Pan and Wendy | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Peter Pan and Wendy

The classic tale of Peter Pan, the boy who refuses to grow up, has captivated young readers for nearly a century. In this delightful rendition, Peter Pan leads Wendy and her brothers to Neverland to meet the Lost Boys. Once they’ve reached their destination, thrilling adventures ensue, including encounters with Captain Hook, Tinker Bell, and crocodiles. Young readers will be exposed to the benefits of determination, courage, and loyalty.

Tie-in Activity: Put on a play with your child, and let her reenact her favorite scene from Peter Pan and Wendy. For added fun, include costumes, stuffed animals, and other props in your child’s performance.
